Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Vulois/Starscream/Sky Lynx/Sideswipe/Torca/Ratchet:::

::Vulois turns to Dachande::
Vulois: Now if you like.  We will go to the Destron base first.  We will 
convince Magmatron to come to the peace talks and to loosen his control on 
you at the same time.  Are you and Battera ready?
~~~~~
::Starscream fired 25 shots from each gun at Nighteyes::
~~~~~
::Sky Lynx dodged the the energy ball but was hit by 5 laser blasts.  he 
fired 2 missles form one gun at Dark Wolf and 2 missles from the other at 
Sixshot::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe destroyed one of the missles but was hit by the other. he fired 2 
missles and 25 shots at Double Punch::
~~~~~
::Torca dodged the missle, was hit by 3 stinger missles, and all the bolts.  
he changhed his gun configuration to exposive shotgun.  he fired 9 explosive 
shells at Double Punch, 8 at Bumblebee, and 8 at Reflector::
~~~~~
::Ratchet got hit by 1 stinger missle and 2 ion disks.  he fired 15 shots 
from one blaster and 1 tusk missle at Injector and 15 shots from the other 
blaster and 1 tusk missle at Manterror::


--part1_e4.eca3edd.2778e5fc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
